title.narrative: Making decent work a reality for domestic workers Tanzania

description.narrative: Study on domestic work patterns, magnitude, conditions and policy issues in Tanzania, undertaken Indicators: Study report produced and used to inform tripartite discussions Leaders and representatives of social partners participate in seminar/workshop with a view to increasing their knowledge of domestic work and C189 Indicators: Participants (number and groups represented); positive feedback from participants about benefits from the seminar/workshop Tripartite consultations on domestic work issues in Tanzania are conducted with a view to formulating a plan of action to address key challenges. Indicators: Participants (number and groups represented); number of meetings; report on meetings produced Set of recommendations by tripartite partners for plan of action to improve working conditions of domestic workers and/or for improvement of national legal framework Indicators: Report on recommendations produced. Campaign to raise awareness among domestic workers, employers and social partners is implemented with participation of social partners Indicators: Number of information materials produced by social partners; number of awareness-raising events organized by social partners; numerical size or geographic scope of target audience of awareness-raising event or intervention implemented by any social partner
